description: Outline application for the restoration of St. David's Church (Westbourne Rd) including external and internal alterations to provide a total of 1455 sq.m of community and worship space (class D1), representing an overall increase of 612 sq.m in addition to a one bed residential unit within the church building.  Demolition of church hall (Lough Rd) and erection of an eight storey building (plus basement), comprising 46 flats and construction of a separate two storey (plus basement) vicarage building comprising a four bedroom residential unit.  Associated landscaping and communal courtyard, accessed from Lough Road.
decision_conditions: The proposed residential development would, by virtue of its height and bulk, have a harmful impact upon the character, harmony and order of the surrounding area.  It would be contrary to policies Env 1, Env 2, H10, D1 and D5 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and the guidance contained within the Islington Urban Design Guide 2006
